document.discussion_title: Celly Bags: Handbags Made Just to Fit Your Cell Phone
document.topic_text: You've got to give it to Cher Horowitz, because twenty years ago she was wearing a cross-body celly bag when most of us didn’t even have cell phones, let alone smart phones. A celly bag, you ask? It's a handbag so small it only fits your cell phone, duh . Well, either a bunch of designers got together for a '90s fest and decided to watch Clueless , or they finally realized that we women just wanted something cute to throw our iPhones in, because these teeny tiny just-the-right-size-for-a-smart-phone bags are becoming a big deal (see: Chloé, Saint Laurent—it never hurts to look, right?). We spotted more than a few at Coachella, which means that, like lots of summer trends that get launched at the fest , you can expect to see them all over this summer. And while we totally acknowledge that you can’t fit much else inside besides a your credit card and maybe keys, but do you really need much more for a day out? As if.
